summary: A police inspector, suspecting an attorney of two child sex murders, has him held for a questioning session that goes on for hours.
cast: Lino Ventura|Michel Serrault|Romy Schneider|Guy Marchand|Didier Agostini|Patrick Depeyrrat|Pierre Maguelon|Annie Miller|Serge Malik|Jean-Claude Penchenat|Yves Pignot|Mathieu Schiffman|Michel Such|Elsa Lunghini|Mohammed Bekireche
keywords: murder of a girl|suspect|new year's eve|wrong suspect|accused of being a pedophile
title: Arresto preventivo
